snippet.title: Crane collapses on Sydney building
snippet.content: Three people have been treated for minor injuries after a crane collapsed in Sydney's south. Emergency services were called to Brodie Spark Drive at Wolli Creek just after 9.30am on Sunday, following reports a crane had fallen off one building and crashed into another. Police said no one was inside the crane at the time but the two buildings were evacuated, with emergency services also creating an exclusion zone. Police have advised people to check www.livetraffic.com.au for updates on road closures. (C) AAP 2017
